Title: Relates to requirements for approval for merger and consolidation of certain health care providers by the public health and health planning council
Summary: Provides for requirements for approval for proposals to merge, consolidate, partner, acquire through the establishment of control or proposals for any other transaction or affiliation of certain health care providers.
LawCode: Amd ยง2801-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requirements for approval for merger and consolidation of certain health care providers by the public health and health planning council
